Level 2: Novice

This is the lowest level at which you get a daily quota of votes to spend on other monks' nodes. With each new level you attain, this quota increases. Details at [id://5938].

(If you happen to lose enough XP to take you back down to [id://21211], and you still have some unspent votes, don't worry — unused votes never get taken away.)

Note also that at this level (actually, all levels 1 through 5), you get an XP bonus for spending your entire daily vote quota.

Level 2 is also the minimum level at which you get to see the [Worst Nodes] listings.

See also: [id://17381]
